caption.p: Relative expression profile of genes governing differential proteins under LB-04 (SL-inoculated Al stress condition) and LB-0 (SL inoculation condition without Al stress). Blue bars indicate gene expression levels under SL-inoculated conditions without Al treatment (LB-0), while red bars indicate gene expression levels under SL-inoculated Al stress conditions (LB-04). The error bars represent technical variations.
